items.content_html: Lightweight wrapper around IndexedDB for secure and structured client-side data storage

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight rich text editor, previewer, and markdown converter

items.content_html: Jspreadsheet is a lightweight vanilla javascript plugin to create amazing web-based interactive tables and spreadsheets compatible with other spreadsheet software.
items.title: jspreadsheet/ce: Jspreadsheet is a lightweight vanilla javascript plugin to create amazing web-based interactive tables and spreadsheets compatible with other spreadsheet software.

items.content_html: This is a classic Tic Tac Toe game developed for fun and practice. The project demonstrates core web development skills by creating an interactive and user-friendly game where two players can compete in real-time. The game is lightweight, responsive, and visually appealing, making it enjoyable for players of all ages.
items.title: PrateekRajSrivastav/TicTacToe: This is a classic Tic Tac Toe game developed for fun and practice. The project demonstrates core web development skills by creating an interactive and user-friendly game where two players can compete in real-time. The game is lightweight, responsive, and visually appealing, making it enjoyable for players of all ages.

items.content_html: SkillTrack is a lightweight learning management platform where users can browse and enroll in courses, track their progress, take quizzes, with admin features.
items.title: cuzondu25/SkillTrack: SkillTrack is a lightweight learning management platform where users can browse and enroll in courses, track their progress, take quizzes, with admin features.

items.content_html: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything one could yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything one could yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more

items.content_html: A lightweight game engine that runs in modern Web browsers, coded in JavaScript and implementing the Sphere v2 API.
items.title: spheredev/oozaru: A lightweight game engine that runs in modern Web browsers, coded in JavaScript and implementing the Sphere v2 API.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: NanoMD is a lightweight Markdown editing and viewing library built on pure JavaScript and native APIs. Can be easily embedded into websites, offers rich features, and supports real-time previewing.
items.title: pardnchiu/NanoMD: NanoMD is a lightweight Markdown editing and viewing library built on pure JavaScript and native APIs. Can be easily embedded into websites, offers rich features, and supports real-time previewing.

items.content_html: Minimal, lightweight (~1kB), fully typed and edge compatible Event Emitter
items.title: DavidHavl/tter: Minimal, lightweight (~1kB), fully typed and edge compatible Event Emitter

items.content_html: QuickUI is a lightweight frontend framework. Supports data binding, i18n support, event binding, conditional rendering, and loop rendering. Helps developers quickly build efficient and flexible web.
items.title: pardnchiu/QuickUI: QuickUI is a lightweight frontend framework. Supports data binding, i18n support, event binding, conditional rendering, and loop rendering. Helps developers quickly build efficient and flexible web.

items.content_html: micropue UI is a dynamic web UI and utility library developed by MICROPUE. It uses javascript and css, and the package size is less than 150KB, which is very lightweight.The micropue UI provides a wealth of component and tool functions and classes. Please read the document.html document carefully before using it.
items.title: Micropue/micropueUI: micropue UI is a dynamic web UI and utility library developed by MICROPUE. It uses javascript and css, and the package size is less than 150KB, which is very lightweight.The micropue UI provides a wealth of component and tool functions and classes. Please read the document.html document carefully before using it.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
